channel.title: Give item command?
channel.description: Its something like ::giveitem (username) (item id) (amount) I don't know how to make it :S , but I do know someone already made this command and I need the command. I'm using Pi.

item.title: Give item command?
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

I also want this
With a simple google search I found this…

if (command.startsWith("giveitem") && (playerRights > 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 4) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); String name = Integer.parseInt(args[3]); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); c.sendMessage(playerName + " Just gave you Item ID: " + newItemID); sendMessage(c.playerName + " Recieved your item: " + newItemID); yell(playerName + " Has Given "+ c.playerName + " Item ID: " + newItemID +" Amount: " + newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { sendMessage("Use as '::giveitem 21 10 alex'!"); } }

I tried changing the stuff to c.sendMessage and changing the String args = to Int args = and everything else that needed to be changed, but I still can’t get it to work.

Read full topic
